[\[352b.1\]]dmus long ri mo bzhin/_/tshong dus dbus su bris gyur kyang /_/bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba/_/chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/_/ji ltar mtsho chen mnyen pa bzhin/_/skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang /_/bdag nyid de nang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[352b.2\]]bka' de ni dus gzhan la dgongs pas 'bras bu yang dus ring la/_ma bsgoms par thams cad mkhyen pa mi 'grub par gsungs so/_/kha cig na re sbyin pa byas pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas pas byang chub thob pas dgon pa brten cing bsgom mi dgos so zhes zer ro/_/de bshad
[\[352b.3\]]pa/_dgon pa la ma brten ma bsgoms par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi 'thob ste/_'di ltar 'phags pa byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po'i mdo las bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
[\[352b.4\]]mthar thug pa'i bar du 'bru mar gyis yongs su bkang ste/_mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam btsugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me tog dang bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang spos dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_bla re dang /_'phan gdugs la sogs
[\[352b.5\]]pas rab tu bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lo 'bum gyi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phul bas ni/_gang gis byang chub don du gnyer zhing tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa des/_mkhan po'am slob dpon la lung mnos te/_kha ton du byed cing tha na tshig bzhi pa'i don
[\[352b.6\]]yid la byed pa dang /_'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'jigs shing skrag_/khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs shing skrag_/sems can gyi don mngon par bsgrub pa na dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa des/_de bas bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[352b.7\]]gzhan yang rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du mchod pa'i rnam pa zhal zas dang /_na bza' dang /_gzims cha dang /_bsnyun gsos dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_bla re dang /_

[\[353a.1\]]'phan gdugs dang /_rgyal srid dang /_rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa sbyin pa byas pa bas/_gang gis dgon pa'i gnas su gnas nas chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o zhes bsgoms nas/_tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam du bsgoms na/_snga ma de bas stong gi cha dang 'bum
[\[353a.2\]]gyi cha dang bye ba'i cha dang bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_nye bar 'jal ba dang /_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes gsungs pas/_sbyin pa ni don chung bar gsungs pa/_dgon pa

[\[353b.5\]]'phags pa shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so/_/'od srungs mun pa mun nag ces bya ba de ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas so zhes 'byung ngo /_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_'od srungs tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so sor rtog pa gcig gis bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las
[\[353b.6\]]dang nyon mongs pa rnams byang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas/_de bas na 'dri klog gi don chung bar gsungs so/_/kha cig na re khyim na gnas pa'i dge ba byas pa'i byang chub thob pas dgon pa la brten te/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom mi dgos so zhes zer ro/_/de la bshad pa zla ba sgron ma'i
[\[353b.7\]]mdo las gsungs pa/_'dod pa dag ni rab tu rten byed cing /_/bu dang chung ma dag la sred bskyed cing /_/smad par bya ba'i khyim la brten pa ste/_/bla med byang chub dam pa gzhar mi 'thob/_/gang dag 'dod pa lci skam me bzhin spong /_/bu dang chung ma dag la sred spangs nas/_/khyim gyis skrag nas khyim nas

[\[354a.1\]]sngon byung ba/_/de dag byang chub mchog 'di rnyed mi dka'/_/gang dag khyim na gnas par byed bzhin du/_/byang chub dam pa mchog 'di thob pa yi/_/sangs rgyas gang yang sngon chad ma byung ste/_/ma 'ongs pa yang mi 'byung gnas pa med/_/rgyal srid mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin spangs nas/_/dben pa

[\[354b.1\]]so/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_grong dang grong khyer dag la dga' spangs la/_/rtag tu dben zhing nags khrod bsten par gyis/_/bse ru lta bur rtag tu gnyis med byos/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di thob/_/ces gsungs so/_/'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i
